pr_title: Serialize and deserialize docker image repo

timeline.message: Serialize and deserialize docker image repo

timeline.bodyText: I realize the deserializer handles empty string, but consider just to serializing dockerImageRepo if it's not set.
timeline.author: freva

timeline.bodyText: Consider having a method on ClusterSpec that returns the full docker image
timeline.author: freva
freva

replies.bodyText: Should not have been there, removed
replies.author: hmusum

timeline.bodyText: This actually shouldn't be allowed, current docker image should always include the version as well.
timeline.author: freva
freva
